subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: His club lost a game on the field and lost ground in the standings yesterday, yet Philadelphia Phillies Manager Charlie Manuel chose to look on the bright side: at least his top relievers got some rest for the stretch run.
snippet: His club lost a game on the field and lost ground in the standings yesterday, yet Philadelphia Phillies Manager Charlie Manuel chose to look on the bright side: at least his top relievers got some rest for the stretch run.
